対訳語: Sk. Ratnasambhava (with a dot above m")"
本: The Weaving of Mantra:  Kūkai and the Construction of Esoteric Buddhist Discourse . Columbia University Press . 1999
説明文: One of the Buddhas of the four directions in the mandala, who surround Mahāvairocana.  [Buddha of the south.  The others are] Aksobhya [with a dot under s"] in the east, Amitābha in the west, and Amoghasiddhi in the north (p. 123). "
